about.text1.1: From the spark of a creative concept to the thrill of a working program, software development has always ignited my passion. My experience at
about.text1.2: has been a launchpad for meaningful projects, where I've continuously honed my skills and expanded my technical knowledge.
about.text2: has provided a strong foundation, while also instilling in me the adaptability and teamwork essential in today's dynamic environments. I thrive under pressure, using innovative thinking to tackle evolving requirements. The true magic lies in transforming complex ideas into practical, efficient solutions â€“ that's what keeps me fueled by programming.
about.text3: Beyond the code, I find constant inspiration in exploring new technologies and pursuing personal projects. Striking a healthy balance is key, and quality time with friends allows me to recharge my creative spirit.

project0.title: Angular Portfolio
project0.description: Developed a personal portfolio using Angular, featuring support for two languages and a dark mode toggle. Implemented internationalization to ensure content is accessible in multiple languages. Enhanced user experience with a sleek, modern design and seamless dark mode transition.

project1.title: Microservice Architecture
project1.description: This project demonstrates a microservice architecture using Docker Compose and NGINX as a reverse proxy. The goal is to deploy multiple services, such as web applications and APIs, which can be accessed under a single domain. NGINX will serve as the reverse proxy, routing requests to the appropriate services based on the URL paths.

project2.title: React Chat App
project2.description: Created a chat application using React, providing a user-friendly interface for real-time messaging. Incorporated state management and component-based architecture to ensure efficient and responsive interactions. Focused on delivering a seamless chat experience with dynamic updates and smooth performance.

project3.title: Django Channels
project3.description: Implemented a real-time chat application using Django Channels. Leveraged WebSockets to facilitate instant communication between users. Ensured scalability and performance, enabling multiple users to engage in live conversations simultaneously.

project4.title: Django Authentication
project4.description: Developed an authentication system using Django and Django REST Framework. Provided secure user registration, login, and token-based authentication for API access. Focused on building a robust and secure backend to manage user data and authentication processes efficiently.

project5.title: Gesunde Tomogochis
project5.description: This project is an interactive web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It showcases modern web development techniques and provides users with a responsive and dynamic user experience. The application is designed to be user-friendly, visually appealing, and functionally rich, leveraging the capabilities of each technology to its fullest.

project6.title: IMDB
project6.description: This project is a full-featured web application built using a powerful stack of modern technologies: Django, Vue.js, Docker, Nginx, and PostgreSQL. Designed to deliver a robust and scalable solution, this application showcases the integration of a reliable backend, a dynamic frontend, and efficient deployment practices.
